blogPost.title: A growing number of people are organising their love and sex lives via spreadsheets. Is this really how to excel in relationships https://t.co/o4eytegmga  From @1843mag
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 越来越多的人通过电子表格来组织他们的爱情和性生活。这真的是恋爱中的优秀表现吗 https://t.co/o4eytegmga 来自@1843mag。
越來越多的人通過電子表格來組織他們的愛情和性生活。這真的是戀愛中的優秀表現嗎 https://t.co/o4eytegmga 來自@1843mag。

previous.title: After studying the available evidence, Avi Loeb concluded that the simplest explanation for the exotic strangeness of ‘Oumuamua was that the interstellar object had been created by an intelligent civilisation beyond Earth https://t.co/dS7OLVz3NS

localize.full_text: 在研究了现有的证据后，阿维-勒布得出结论，对'Oumuamua'的异国情调的最简单解释是，这个星际物体是由地球以外的智慧文明创造的https://t.co/dS7OLVz3NS。
在研究了現有的證據後，阿維-勒布得出結論，對'Oumuamua'的異國情調的最簡單解釋是，這個星際物體是由地球以外的智慧文明創造的https://t.co/dS7OLVz3NS。

next.title: Governments need to plan for covid-19 as an endemic disease. They will have to work out how to switch from emergency measures to policies that are sustainable indefinitely https://t.co/ya9GT6QSwe

localize.full_text: 各国政府需要将covid-19作为一种地方性疾病进行规划。它们必须研究如何从应急措施转为可无限期持续的政策https://t.co/ya9GT6QSwe。
各國政府需要將covid-19作爲一種地方性疾病進行規劃。它們必須研究如何從應急措施轉爲可無限期持續的政策https://t.co/ya9GT6QSwe。
